Text: BOO!!!! This won't download. It takes forever to download. Is there someway to make it have more seeds so that I can download it and it won't download slow on my uTorrent? Please write back.
This took less than a day to download. I didn't mind the wait because I've been looking all over for the Japanese dubs of this movie (as well as the first one). So you get a huge thanks from me! =)
